metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15267 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: In GNU Libextractor 1.4, there is a NULL Pointer Dereference in flac_metadata in flac_extractor.c. It was discovered that Libextractor incorrectly handled certain FLAC metadata. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.

criterions.comment: libextractor: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
